channel.title: Kasten on Julia Furst Morgado
channel.description: Recent content in Kasten on Julia Furst Morgado

item.title: Install Veeam Kasten on an Amazon EKS cluster
item.description: In this guide, we will walk through the process of installing Veeam Kasten on an Amazon EKS cluster.

item.title: Install Veeam Kasten on a Kubernetes cluster running on kind
item.description: In this guide, we’ll walk through the process of installing Veeam Kasten on a Kubernetes cluster running on kind (Kubernetes in Docker).
